eventDecorators.name: NewWithdrawTimeout
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the owner increases the timeout.

eventDecorators.name: StakeToGno
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone swap STAKE for GNO.

eventDecorators.name: WithdrawTokens
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the owner withdraw tokens.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setWithdrawTimeout
functionDecorators.description: Method that allows the owner to increase the withdraw timeout.

functionDecorators.name: stakeToGno
functionDecorators.description: Method that allows swap STAKE for GNO tokens at the ratio of 1 STAKE --> 0.00214308824 GNO Users can either use the permit functionality, or approve previously the tokens and send an empty _permitData.

parameterDecorators.name: _permitData
parameterDecorators.description: Raw data of the call `permit` of the token.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawTokens
functionDecorators.description: Method that allows the owner to withdraw any token from this contract In order to withdraw GNO tokens the owner must wait until the withdrawTimeout expires.
